abstract: Customers of the bank were prevented from gaining Internet access to their accounts.
snippet: Customers of the bank were prevented from gaining Internet access to their accounts.
lead_paragraph: Computer problems prevented millions of Chase customers from gaining access to their accounts over the bank’s Web site for a second day on Wednesday. Even after access was restored, complaints persisted as the rush of customers logging on to the site bogged down the company’s computers, making service spotty.

headline.main: Online Woes Plague Chase for 2nd Day
headline.print_headline: Online Woes Plague Chase For 2nd Day
